application_type_full: Prior Approval: Change of use - offices to dwellinghouses
description: Change of use of ground, first, second, third and fourth floors form office (B1 use class) to residential (C3 use Class), to provide 62 residential flats comprising of a mix of 18 x 1 bedroom, 36 x 2 bedroom and 8 x 3 bedroom flats. (Prior Approval Application).
